member.name: T:WCFServer.Client
member.summary: Logged client with session, callback, name and channel data.

member.name: P:WCFServer.Client.Callback
member.summary: Get callback object and use to call client methods.

member.name: P:WCFServer.Client.Channel
member.summary: Get channel object of current session.

member.name: M:WCFServer.Client.#ctor(System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject,WCFReference.IClientCallback,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create instance of Client class which represents one of connected clients.
member.param: Represents current channel which is used to connect client with server.

member.name: M:WCFServer.WCFService.Login(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Most important method which allows client register himself and use other methods.

member.name: M:WCFServer.WCFService.DisconnectEvent(System.Object,System.EventArgs,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: What will happen when client disconnects.

member.name: M:WCFServer.WCFService.ConsoleWrite(System.String)
member.summary: "Call me maybe" generally for debug purposes.

member.name: M:WCFServer.WCFService.SendPosition(System.String)
member.summary: Send a controll object to server with controll data eg. whether player should move to front, back, twist or just stay in place.
member.param: Serialized KeyValuePair contains Position and angle of the player.

member.name: M:WCFServer.WCFService.GameOpen(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Tell server that client just open or close game window so server knows the player is active and "in game" or not.
member.param: TRUE if game windows is open or FALSE if not.

member.name: M:WCFServer.WCFService.GetPlayers
member.summary: Get from server currently logged players.

member.name: M:WCFServer.WCFService.SetInside(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set inner game object for player e.g. Car.
